title: vaDa pazhani vAsanin
sahitya:
vaDa pazhani vAsanin aDi tozhuvAi manamE diDha bhaktiyuDanE anudinamumE ini nI


anupallavi

  iDar mighum vAzhvidu inbamODu kazhiya toDarum tolvinai tollaiyellAmozhiya


caraNam    eDutta piravi tannil ellaiyinri mEnmEl aDuttiDum allalai taDutt-AtkoLLavum 
keDuttun vAzhvaip-pAzh paDuttum kavalaiyai viDuttup-peru vAzhvaik-koDuttu udavavum
